mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groups ( group_no, group_name, title, text, view_count, lat, lng, category_code, meeting_date, reg_date ) VALUES ( seq_groups_group_no.nextval, #{groupName}, #{title}, #{text}, 0, #{lat:VARCHAR}, #{lng:VARCHAR}, #{categoryCode}, #{meetingDate:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT group_no FROM groups WHERE title=#{title} AND group_name=#{groupName}

SELECT j.user_id, g.group_no, g.group_name, g.title, g.text, g.view_count, g.lat, g.lng, g.category_code, g.meeting_date, g.reg_date FROM groups g, join j WHERE g.group_no = j.group_no AND j.group_role = 1 AND g.group_no = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date, t.tran_status_code FROM group p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no = #{searchKeyword}
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.price = #{searchKeyword}
AND t.tran_status_code IS NULL
AND t.tran_status_code=1
AND t.tran_status_code=2
AND t.tran_status_code=3
ORDER BY p.price ASC
ORDER BY p.price DESC
ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC
) countTable
